views.markdown: **TransLux** transforms your iOS experience with seamless, system-wide translation integration. Add intelligent translation buttons directly to your text selection menu, making multilingual communication effortless across all your apps.

**Select and Translate:**

Simply select any text in any app - whether it's a message, email, web page, or social media post. TransLux adds translation buttons to your text selection callout bar, giving you instant access to powerful translation engines without leaving your current app.

**Multiple Translation Engines:**

Choose from four powerful translation engines: Google Translate (primary), Baidu Translate, ModernMT, and Microsoft Translator. Each engine has its strengths, and you can switch between them instantly with a single tap on the engine icon in the TransLux UI. If one engine is unavailable or restricted in your region, seamlessly switch to another.

**Smart Translation Interface:**

The translation appears in a beautiful, native-looking interface that matches your system theme. View both your original text and translation side-by-side, with clear language indicators. The interface supports both portrait and landscape modes, adapts to your screen size, and can be dismissed with a simple tap outside.

**Customizable Language Pairs:**

Configure two language pairs for quick access. TransLux automatically detects the source language and translates to your preferred target language. Perfect for bilingual users who frequently switch between specific languages.

**Intelligent Caching:**

TransLux remembers your recent translations, providing instant results for previously translated text. This dramatically improves performance and reduces network usage, making your translation experience lightning-fast.

• **Four translation engines** - Google, Baidu, ModernMT, and Microsoft with instant switching

• **Smart text selection** - translation buttons appear directly in the callout bar

• **Dual language configuration** - set up two language pairs for quick translations

• **Customizable button styles** - choose between Text, Symbol, or Image buttons

• **Three UI themes** - Auto, Dark, and Light modes to match your preference

• **Three size options** - Compact, Medium, or Big interface for optimal readability

• **App whitelist system** - enable TransLux only in the apps you choose

• **Landscape mode support** - works perfectly in both portrait and landscape orientations

• **Performance optimized** - intelligent caching system for lightning-fast translations

• **Tap to dismiss** - tap anywhere outside the translation UI to close it

• **Text shadow option** - enhance readability with optional text shadows

• **Universal compatibility** - works with user apps and system apps

• **DRM protection** - license activation system ensures authorized usage

• **Privacy focused** - translations are processed securely without storing sensitive data

**Initial Release**

• Four translation engines: Google, Baidu, ModernMT, Microsoft
• Instant engine switching with single tap
• Smart text selection integration
• Dual language pair configuration
• Three button styles: Text, Symbol, Image
• Three UI themes: Auto, Dark, Light
• Three size options: Compact, Medium, Big
• App whitelist system for precise control
• Landscape mode support
• Intelligent caching for performance
• Tap outside to dismiss
• Optional text shadow
• License activation with DRM protection
• Master toggle and granular controls
• Support for user and system apps
• Instant settings without respring
• String encryption and obfuscation
